Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix UI flickering by hiding empty PokerLeaderboard

Previously, the PokerLeaderboard component would alternate between
showing a placeholder message and the actual leaderboard table when
there were no fish with poker stats. This caused constant layout
shifting and UI flickering.

Now the component returns null when there''s no data, preventing any
layout shift. The leaderboard will only appear once fish have actually
played poker games and have stats to display.
